Even better, why don’t you just pack your things and head home!

Huh?

I knew this was coming.

Yeah, he aggravated the

hot-tempered captain.

After being on land a few days, Darwin befriended a gentleman from England.

I run a farm

at a place called Cape Frio.

I also never expected to
meet another Englishman
here.

I’m so happy

to have the chance to meet a scholar from back home.

I’d like to invite you to my home, if you have the time, of course.

Yes, I’d be delighted.

I’ve already been kicked off the boat as it is.

75
